column5: Anyone tell me what the selling price would be on a 13' GL3, the reel seat and cork do move but I called Loomis Canada and they said it is returnable and will fix it free of charge. I just don't have the coin to send it. I may be looking to sell this to buy a slowpitch bat so we can work a deal if you have a credit card to buy the bat.....let me know!!  *ROD IS GONE*
